mapper.select: select bno , title , content , writer , registerDate , updateDate from board where bno > 0 -- bno가 숫자 PK이기 때문에 걸면 빨라짐 order by bno desc

select * from ( select bno , title , content , writer , registerDate , updateDate , row_number() over (order by bno desc) as row_num from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc ) where row_num between #{skip} and #{skippedAmount}
select bno , title , content , writer , registerDate , updateDate from board where bno = #{bno}
